name: buyer_entity_name
title: What is the legal name of the entity?
label: Entity Name
description: If the entity is a trust, enter the complete trust name. If under probate, enter the full name of the estate, including the case number.
tips: Enter the complete legal name exactly as it appears on official documents.
small_print: Please ensure the name entered above exactly matches both the supporting documentation and how the entity name appears on the Secretary of State website of the state where the entity is registered. Discrepancies in the entity name may cause delays in closing.
